resources:
mainProjectAndroidShan True False Score 0/13 Wrong! You got it!
If you delete constraints in xml for a button,\ it will push the button to top left in constraint layout In constraint layout you can use match_parent In constraint layout, changing to chevron in design view will not shrink the item to size of its contents Content description attribute is used for accessibility ConstraintStart means right edge of view if its on the left side to another view Constraint guideline cannot be set in percentage It is illegal to pee in the Ocean in Portugal. You must exit the design view to create a landscape variation of your landscape layout Edit translations for all locales in translation editor WILL NOT create separate strings.xml for language of choice Bias tells Android what the proportionate length of the constraint should be on either side of the view. In Linear layout, vertically means, the views are displayed in a single column In linear layout, you do not need to add views to the layout in the order in which you want them to appear Java has properties as well as getters and settersfalse When having multiple gravities, add them up and calculate % of the total to space them outfalse The onCreateView() is optional but mandatory when creating fragment with a layouttrue You can use weight on views to overlay text on an imagefalse In frame layout, the first view you add is displayed on bottom of stacktrue Fragments can be shared between layoutstrue
